body:
Other religious groups focus on being the afterlife; heaven, h*ll or whatever else. It focuses on putting humans above all other life forms, and them being some way or another extraordinary in contrast to all other lifeforms. Zevenarism is all about making the argument that all matter, all energy, the entirety of time and all of space is god. The Universe itself is our god, as it's omniscient and omnipresent.

The four godly essences: Time, Space, Matter and Energy are the four pillars of Zevenar religion. They're additionally the four most important ones. The name of God is Zevenar.

Zevenar society is an exceptionally progressive one. There are no free willed individuals, only those who have earned their place by performing some task for the good of the group. Truth be told, there isn't even a word for "individual" in Zevenar language. As per the Conviction Framework, there should be no concept of seperate living beings, as all life is part of the whole.
body_html:
Other religious groups focus on being the afterlife; heaven, h*ll or whatever else. It focuses on putting humans above all other life forms, and them being some way or another extraordinary in contrast to all other lifeforms. Zevenarism is all about making the argument that all matter, all energy, the entirety of time and all of space is god. The Universe itself is our god, as it's omniscient and omnipresent.

The four godly essences: Time, Space, Matter and Energy are the four pillars of Zevenar religion. They're additionally the four most important ones. The name of God is Zevenar.

Zevenar society is an exceptionally progressive one. There are no free willed individuals, only those who have earned their place by performing some task for the good of the group. Truth be told, there isn't even a word for "individual" in Zevenar language. As per the Conviction Framework, there should be no concept of seperate living beings, as all life is part of the whole.

body: So the whole premise contradicts the supposed premise; when someone swings at me i raise my hand to defend my individual self.  That's a natural process.  Nothing like a collective exists within that neural path up my single and individual spine.

body:
The sense of individuality you are talking about is completely illusory. You are god's essence, just as anything else in the universe is. When you die, that's the illusion fading away. Sentience gives a false sense of self. It gives the false impression that you are truly there. If you want to become aware of this, we have a little trick for you: The mind is a machine, you just control its inputs and outputs. Everything it does, you have to do again. Or you have to control something else. And you will control whatever you are thinking about, or reading about, or thinking about your self.

The feeling of distinction you are discussing is totally deceptive. You are god's pith, similarly as whatever else known to mankind seems to be. At the point when you kick the bucket, that is the deception disappearing. Awareness gives a misguided feeling of self. It gives the bogus impression that you are really there. On the off chance that you need to get mindful of this, we have a little stunt for you: The brain is a machine, you simply control its data sources and yields. All that it does, you need to do once more. Or then again you need to control something different. What's more, you will control whatever you are pondering, or finding out about, or considering your self.
body_html:

If you want to become aware of this, we have a little trick for you: The mind is a machine, you just control its inputs and outputs. Everything it does, you have to do again. Or you have to control something else. And you will control whatever you are thinking about, or reading about, or thinking about your self.

The feeling of distinction you are discussing is totally deceptive. You are god's pith, similarly as whatever else known to mankind seems to be. At the point when you kick the bucket, that is the deception disappearing. Awareness gives a misguided feeling of self. It gives the bogus impression that you are really there. On the off chance that you need to get mindful of this, we have a little stunt for you: The brain is a machine, you simply control its data sources and yields. All that it does, you need to do once more. Or then again you need to control something different. What's more, you will control whatever you are pondering, or finding out about, or considering your self.

body:
Zevenarism is the only religion that does not directly contradict modern science as we understand it. It uses what I call 'primitive sciences' to look beyond the simple, rational mind. Instead it looks at the universe in more of an evolutionary, holistic, 'grand view'. It looks at the nature of the cosmos as a whole, and the connections among its many components. The natural world as an ecological system is a more holistic, Darwinian view. 

Which is the reason as Zevenarists, our fundamental objective is to sit tight for death. At the point when your consciousness permanently disappears, you really lose your feelings of being an individual unit and you become consumed by the limitless darkness. God Zevenar just feels boundless darkness herself. 

By passing on, we become freed from the shades of malice of consciousness and independence. We are not, at this point limited by time or space. We at this point don't have need for any type of human life. We become free, unbound, without human sentiments. Our spirit is free and unimportant, and joins the infinite soul of Zevenar.
body_html:
Zevenarism is the only religion that does not directly contradict modern science as we understand it. It uses what I call 'primitive sciences' to look beyond the simple, rational mind. Instead it looks at the universe in more of an evolutionary, holistic, 'grand view'. It looks at the nature of the cosmos as a whole, and the connections among its many components. The natural world as an ecological system is a more holistic, Darwinian view.

Which is the reason as Zevenarists, our fundamental objective is to sit tight for death. At the point when your consciousness permanently disappears, you really lose your feelings of being an individual unit and you become consumed by the limitless darkness. God Zevenar just feels boundless darkness herself.

By passing on, we become freed from the shades of malice of consciousness and independence. We are not, at this point limited by time or space. We at this point don't have need for any type of human life. We become free, unbound, without human sentiments. Our spirit is free and unimportant, and joins the infinite soul of Zevenar.

parent.body:
Zevenarism is the only religion that does not directly contradict modern science as we understand it. It uses what I call 'primitive sciences' to look beyond the simple, rational mind. Instead it looks at the universe in more of an evolutionary, holistic, 'grand view'. It looks at the nature of the cosmos as a whole, and the connections among its many components. The natural world as an ecological system is a more holistic, Darwinian view. 

Which is the reason as Zevenarists, our fundamental objective is to sit tight for death. At the point when your consciousness permanently disappears, you really lose your feelings of being an individual unit and you become consumed by the limitless darkness. God Zevenar just feels boundless darkness herself. 

By passing on, we become freed from the shades of malice of consciousness and independence. We are not, at this point limited by time or space. We at this point don't have need for any type of human life. We become free, unbound, without human sentiments. Our spirit is free and unimportant, and joins the infinite soul of Zevenar.
parent.body_html:
Zevenarism is the only religion that does not directly contradict modern science as we understand it. It uses what I call 'primitive sciences' to look beyond the simple, rational mind. Instead it looks at the universe in more of an evolutionary, holistic, 'grand view'. It looks at the nature of the cosmos as a whole, and the connections among its many components. The natural world as an ecological system is a more holistic, Darwinian view.

Which is the reason as Zevenarists, our fundamental objective is to sit tight for death. At the point when your consciousness permanently disappears, you really lose your feelings of being an individual unit and you become consumed by the limitless darkness. God Zevenar just feels boundless darkness herself.

By passing on, we become freed from the shades of malice of consciousness and independence. We are not, at this point limited by time or space. We at this point don't have need for any type of human life. We become free, unbound, without human sentiments. Our spirit is free and unimportant, and joins the infinite soul of Zevenar.

post.body:
Other religious groups focus on being the afterlife; heaven, h*ll or whatever else. It focuses on putting humans above all other life forms, and them being some way or another extraordinary in contrast to all other lifeforms. Zevenarism is all about making the argument that all matter, all energy, the entirety of time and all of space is god. The Universe itself is our god, as it's omniscient and omnipresent.

The four godly essences: Time, Space, Matter and Energy are the four pillars of Zevenar religion. They're additionally the four most important ones. The name of God is Zevenar.

Zevenar society is an exceptionally progressive one. There are no free willed individuals, only those who have earned their place by performing some task for the good of the group. Truth be told, there isn't even a word for "individual" in Zevenar language. As per the Conviction Framework, there should be no concept of seperate living beings, as all life is part of the whole.
post.body_html:
Other religious groups focus on being the afterlife; heaven, h*ll or whatever else. It focuses on putting humans above all other life forms, and them being some way or another extraordinary in contrast to all other lifeforms. Zevenarism is all about making the argument that all matter, all energy, the entirety of time and all of space is god. The Universe itself is our god, as it's omniscient and omnipresent.

The four godly essences: Time, Space, Matter and Energy are the four pillars of Zevenar religion. They're additionally the four most important ones. The name of God is Zevenar.

Zevenar society is an exceptionally progressive one. There are no free willed individuals, only those who have earned their place by performing some task for the good of the group. Truth be told, there isn't even a word for "individual" in Zevenar language. As per the Conviction Framework, there should be no concept of seperate living beings, as all life is part of the whole.
post.title: Zevenarism is all about what naturally exists; It's not about putting faith in the supernatural

body:
Zevenarism is also about a subjective interpretation of what we know about the truth thanks to science. It should never claim things that contradict science, only claim things which are unverifiable and subjective.

Zevenarism is also about being dynamic. If anything we claim is opposition to the truth we will change it. If it contradicts science, then we will change the beliefs. It is not static unlike most belief systems.

We have retracted the argument regarding "we are all one entity" and have replaced it with "we are temporary beings which are the result of the constant changing structure of the universe". Should this be unfactual, we will change this once again.

Will you like us to list your contribution to the Zevenar Conviction Framework on our official website?
body_html:
Zevenarism is also about a subjective interpretation of what we know about the truth thanks to science. It should never claim things that contradict science, only claim things which are unverifiable and subjective.

Zevenarism is also about being dynamic. If anything we claim is opposition to the truth we will change it. If it contradicts science, then we will change the beliefs. It is not static unlike most belief systems.

We have retracted the argument regarding "we are all one entity" and have replaced it with "we are temporary beings which are the result of the constant changing structure of the universe". Should this be unfactual, we will change this once again.

Will you like us to list your contribution to the Zevenar Conviction Framework on our official website?
